## KNOWN OBSERVATIONS (Not Blockers)

### Development Mode Email
- **Status:** Working in development mode
- **Behavior:** Emails logged to console instead of sent
- **Impact:** None for deployment
- **Action:** Configure SMTP in production for real emails

### Mock Data vs API Integration
- **Status:** Currently using mock data
- **Backend APIs:** Fully functional and tested
- **Impact:** None - this is intentional for current phase
- **Action:** Frontend already has infrastructure for API integration when needed

---

## TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

### Stack
- **Frontend:** React 19, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI
- **Backend:** FastAPI, Python 3.x
- **Database:** MongoDB
- **Process Manager:** Supervisor
- **Web Server:** Nginx (for code-server proxy)

### Ports
- **Frontend:** 3000 (internal)
- **Backend:** 8001 (internal)
- **MongoDB:** 27017 (internal)
- **External:** Mapped via Kubernetes ingress

### Architecture
```
[Client Browser]
      â†“
[React Frontend :3000]
      â†“
[FastAPI Backend :8001]
      â†“
[MongoDB :27017]
```

## SUPPORT DOCUMENTATION

### Available Guides
1. `/app/BACKEND_TESTING_GUIDE.md` - Complete backend API documentation
2. `/app/SERVICES_QA_AUDIT_REPORT.md` - Services section quality audit
3. `/app/SERVICES_DROPDOWN_BUG_FIX_REPORT.md` - Navigation bug fix details
4. `/app/contracts.md` - Backend integration contracts

### Quick Commands
```bash
# Check service status
sudo supervisorctl status all

# View logs
tail -f /var/log/supervisor/backend.out.log
tail -f /var/log/supervisor/frontend.out.log

# Restart services
sudo supervisorctl restart backend
sudo supervisorctl restart frontend
sudo supervisorctl restart all

# Test backend
curl http://localhost:8001/api/

# Run health check
/tmp/full_health_check.sh
```
